summary: REQ-79 and REQ-80 appear implemented (Header navigation no longer shows Intake; Home page content is Billing-only). REQ-81 is only partially met: /intake no longer shows Intake page content due to a redirect, but the /intake route is still present in the router configuration rather than being removed.

missing_requirements.requirement: Remove the Intake route from the app routing configuration so the Intake page is not part of the navigable application flow.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff still defines a TanStack Router route with path "/intake" (now rendering an IntakeRedirect component). This keeps the Intake route in the routing configuration rather than removing it.
evidence: frontend/src/App.tsx (defines `intakeRoute` with `path: '/intake'` and includes it in `routeTree`)
frontend/src/pages/IntakeRedirect.tsx (new component used by the /intake route)

hallucinated_features.description: Added a dedicated `/intake` redirect page/component (IntakeRedirect) and kept `/intake` as an explicit route that redirects to `/billing`.
hallucinated_features.reason: The request asked to remove the Intake route from routing; implementing a new redirect component/route is an alternative approach and is not explicitly requested as a new page/component.
